tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE error_correction_operations (
  qubit_state VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  error_syndrome VARCHAR(100),
  correction_operation VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE syndrome_corrections (
    syndrome_correction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    syndrome_id INT NOT NULL,
    correction_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (syndrome_id) REFERENCES error_syndromes(syndrome_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (correction_id) REFERENCES error_corrections(correction_id)
);
